xronos 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Make a request to the XRONOS API

xronos_request.Rd

Request data directly from the XRONOS API. See https://xronos.ch/api for supported filters. Use xronos_request() to retrieve all data.

xronos_request(query = NA, api_url = xronos_api_url())

xronos_api_url(version = "v1")

Arguments

query

Valid query string.
api_url

Root address of the XRONOS API. xronos_api_url() provides the default value.
version

Version of the API to use. Currently has no effect.

Value

Parsed JSON response.

Examples

xronos_request("query_labnr=AAR-1847")

#> # A tibble: 1 x 21
#>      id labnr    reference source_database    bp   std cal_bp cal_std delta_c13
#>   <int> <chr>    <lgl>     <chr>           <int> <int>  <int>   <int>     <dbl>
#> 1 29766 AAR-1847 NA        radon            4780   100   5502     209     -27.3
#> # … with 12 more variables: site <chr>, site_phase <chr>, site_type <chr>,
#> #   feature <chr>, period <lgl>, typochronological_unit <lgl>,
#> #   ecochronological_unit <lgl>, material <chr>, species <chr>, lat <chr>,
#> #   lng <chr>, country <chr>
